WorkItem.Description: When adding in AccountController, AccountModel, ViewModels, Errors are thrown for multiple membership functions. I also tried importing the files directly from the sample project for membership, but still receive the same errors.

Comments.Message: That error shows that you don't have a reference to System.Web.ApplicationServices, which is odd because that's included in a default ASP.NET MVC 2 Empty Web Application. Can you try adding that reference and see if that fixes it?
